titleStmt.title: The way to good success propounded in a sermon preached upon November the 24th, 1684, at Trinity-house-Chappel, to the wardens, elder brethren, and fraternity of masters and seamen of the same house, at Kingston upon Hull / by N.L., minister of the gospel at St. Mary's Church in Hull.
titleStmt.author: N. L.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John White, and are to be sold by Thomas Clark bookseller in Hull,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
